title: solar_inverter_shutdown_fault_indicator_record
summary: During solar power system shutdown, the inverter shows a red warning indicator.
description: This data unit records the inverter status at shutdown time. A red warning indicator is visible. No interpretation is added.

observation.indicator_meaning_label: warning/fault indicator visible on device panel

reference.note: Reference to the morning power-on record for operational continuity.

external_reference.note: External reference for raw image evidence.
